MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL21 postcode area of Corwen affecting properties in Gweddelwern, Bryn Saith Marchog and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:36am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on 30th March 2021.
